name: Diver Rescue
description:
Rescue the diver and get him safely to the surface!

Solve fun handmade puzzles by removing stuff or cut ropes!
The relaxing sound of the water will definitely help you to find the correct solution.

Features :
* Relaxing theme with all the water and the fishes!
* Creative handmade physics puzzles to solve!
* Feel relieved everytime you complete a level!
* A lot of fun!
